#  SMART HELMET

##  Find Your SENA Device

\- Please select a series -

  * Snow Helmet
  * Hybrid
  * Remote Controls

#### LATITUDE S1

Snow Helmet with Built-In Bluetooth Communication & Audio

BUY NOW Learn more

Compare Snow Helmet Products Snow Helmet Chart Snow Helmet Chart

## LATITUDE S1

SLEEK AND VERSATILE SNOW HELMET WITH COMM SYSTEM

The Latitude S1 is Sena's latest snowsports helmet custom-designed around our
proven Bluetooth communication platform. With speakers and a microphone
seamlessly integrated directly within the helmet, the Latitude S1's full-
duplex intercom makes speaking with your similarly equipped skiing/riding
friends on any black-diamond run (or bunny slope) as easy as if they were
standing right next to you in the lift line. Also, pair your smartphone to the
Latitude S1 and stream your music or take phone calls right into the helmet.
Safe, comfortable, and feature-rich, the Latitude S1 is the right choice any
time you hit the slopes.

Learn more

RUMBA

Multi-Sport Helmet with 2-Way HD Intercom
